CHEAT:

Make the towing trucks cost only one Euro: Go to the directory where tow truck simulator is installed, open the folder "vehicles", example: C:\Program Files\astragon Software GmbH\Tow Truck Simulator 2010\vehicles.

Now you see about 8 files called "towtruck-file".

Open each towtruckfile with notes and look for the column "price". Change the price to 1 in every towtruck file and you can know go to the dealer and buy each brand new towtruck for one euro!

Cheat brought to you by JOOHAN the swedish kingpin
